class SXF_AcceleratorNode

Interface

Public Members
virtual ~SXF_AcceleratorNode()
virtual int openObject(const char* nodeName, const char* nodeType) = 0
virtual void update()
virtual void close()
virtual void setDesign(const char* name) = 0
virtual void setLength(double l) = 0
virtual void setAt(double l) = 0
virtual void setHAngle(double h) = 0
virtual int isElement() const = 0
Protected Members
SXF_AcceleratorNode(SXF_OStream& out, const char* nodeType)
void setType(const char* type)

Description

The AcceleratorNode class defines the common basis interface of SXF sequence and element readers. According to the SXF object model, Accelerator is represented by a hierarchical tree of sequences and elements. Each accelerator node has a unique identifier with the particular accelerator namespace, but it may be shared by the different accelerators (e.g. in iteraction regions, injection and extraction systems, and others). All its attributes are optional and have default value or behaviour.

Member Description

virtual ~SXF_AcceleratorNode()

Destructor.

virtual int openObject(const char* nodeName, const char* nodeType) = 0

Prepare a node reader for operations.

virtual void update()

Complete all operations (Default: do nothing)

virtual void close()

Return this node reader to its initial conditions. (Default: do nothing)

virtual void setDesign(const char* name) = 0

Set a reference to the design entity. Because the SXF accelerator description is complete and independent from the external sources, this link does not effect on the sequence parameters and provides only the relationship with the site-specific accelerator design model.

virtual void setLength(double l) = 0

Set an node length along the design orbit (units: m).

virtual void setAt(double l) = 0

Set a longitudinal position of the node with respect to the beginning of the parent sequence (units: m).

virtual void setHAngle(double h) = 0

Set a horizontal angle (units: rad).

virtual int isElement() const = 0

Check node if it is a leaf or a composite.

SXF_AcceleratorNode(SXF_OStream& out, const char* nodeType)

Constructor.

void setType(const char* type)

Set node type
